name: The Entity (itch) (PixelItchio) (PixelItchio)
description:
A fighter, cursed by a wizard, returns in the 90s as a soul that possesses a man; he will protect his friend from an unexpected encounter...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tips:

Level one.  The entity is heavy and slow. You can move one step at a time only, by pressing the "up" arrow. You can attack by pressing "ctrl". You cannot attack and move at same time. The goal is to reach the portal.

Level two. Press "left/right" arrows to move; "ctrl" to fight. The goal is to defeat the wizard; the fight is a small puzzle.

Level three. Press "left/right" arrows to move; and "up" to hide (only when you have the scroll). Press "ctrl" to pick the scroll. The goal is to leave without being seen by guards.

Level four. Tap "ctrl" rapidly to run away from the guard.

Level five. "right/left" arrows to move and "ctrl" to fight. The goal is to follow your friend in the streets.

Level six. "right" arrow to move; "ctrl" to fight. The goal is to reach the opposite side.

Level seven. "left/right" arrow to move; "ctrl" to fight. The goal is to defeat the wizard; the fight is a small puzzle.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bug :

It happened only once but if the controls don't respond, tap "left ctrl" and it will fix itself.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made with GameMaker 1.4

This game has no sound.

Have Fun!
